Scripts.OnEnter: if(self.tooltipText ~= nil) then GameTooltip_AddNewbieTip(self, self.tooltipText, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, self.newbieText) end

Scripts.OnLoad: if ( self:IsEnabled() ~= 1 ) then local name = self:GetName() _G[name.."Left"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Disabled") _G[name.."Middle"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Disabled") _G[name.."Right"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Disabled") end
Scripts.OnMouseDown: if ( self:IsEnabled() == 1 ) then local name = self:GetName() _G[name.."Left"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Down") _G[name.."Middle"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Down") _G[name.."Right"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Down") end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: if ( self:IsEnabled() == 1 ) then local name = self:GetName() _G[name.."Left"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Up") _G[name.."Middle"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Up") _G[name.."Right"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Up") end
Scripts.OnShow: if ( self:IsEnabled() == 1 ) then -- we need to reset our textures just in case we were hidden before a mouse up fired local name = self:GetName() _G[name.."Left"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Up") _G[name.."Middle"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Up") _G[name.."Right"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Up") end
Scripts.OnEnter: if(self.tooltipText ~= nil) then GameTooltip_AddNewbieTip(self, self.tooltipText, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, self.newbieText) end

Scripts.OnClick: if UIPanelWindows[self:GetParent():GetName()] then ToggleFrame(self:GetParent()) else self:GetParent():Hide(); end

Scripts.OnLoad:
self.Middle:ClearAllPoints() self.Middle:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.Top, "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, 0) self.Middle:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.Bottom, "TOPRIGHT", 0, 0)
self.Background:ClearAllPoints() self.Background:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.Top, 2, 0) self.Background:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.Bottom, 0, 0)
